name: Dart idb shim samples
body:
Collection of small samples that uses [idb_shim](http://alextekartik.github.io/idb_shim.dart/) polyfill, either created from scratch or from projects I found using indexeddb.
* Simple todo ported from [dart-lang](https://github.com/dart-lang/dart-samples/tree/master/html5/web/indexeddb/todo) samples: [live demo](http://alextekartik.github.io/idb_shim_samples.dart/mini-todo/build/web/index.html) | [source code](https://github.com/alextekartik/idb_shim_samples.dart/tree/master/mini-todo)

...more to come
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
